title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in Photon, I encountered a bug where the popup menu does not appear in the Java editor ruler.
OB: When I open a Java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler, I expect a menu to popup which allows me to add breakpoints or marks. However, in this case, no menu appears.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
I expect a menu to popup, allowing me to add breakpoints or marks.
But in this case, the menu does not appear.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
Expected result: A menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks.
Actual result: No menu appears.
